Subject: Re: Fury

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Unitrons head met Megatrons with a sickening crunch. Megatron opened his
eyes, and spit out part of his lip, one of his eyes faded in and out off
function. He shook his head to regain his bearings, then sneered. He had
had enough. He stood back to his feet, still holding on, and aimed his
fusion cannon at Unitron's chest. At this range it could hurt him as
well, and should render his foe inoperative. "I give you a one way
invitation, to oblivion. Do you Yield?" He asked harshly.
